posts.post_title: SOLD:  T206 Frank "Home Run" Baker PSA 4 (Sweet Cap 350-460 Overprint Fac. 42)
posts.post_content:
$309 delivered if paid by Paypal
$300 delivered if paying by check

No creases or wrinkles.  Minor corner wear and very mild abrasion on reverse which does not affect the print (only visible under bright light).
